fields.title: Link Title
fields.description: Used as the title for this page when included in a list, like the section shortcode.
fields.name: linktitle

fields.title: Summary
fields.description: Displayed when paginated or in a list and as page description
fields.name: summary

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: Determines order for pages; lower weight first
fields.name: weight

fields.title: Platen
fields.description: These options override site-wide settings for this page. Don't specify a value if you want to inherit the site defaults.
fields.name: Platen

fields.title: Render Page Title as Heading
fields.description: Use this setting to specify whether the page title should be rendered as an <h1> element instead of the default <strong> element.
fields.name: TitleAsHeading

fields.title: Render the Table of Contents
fields.description: Specifies whether to render the table of contents for the page. This setting overrides the site's Display.TableOfContents.Render, if set.
fields.name: Render

fields.title: Minimum Heading Level
fields.description: Specify the minimum heading level to include in the page's table of contents, overriding the site's Display.TableOfContents.MinimumLevel setting. This value only affects the table of contents when UseBuiltIn is set to false.
fields.name: MinimumLevel

fields.title: Maximum Heading Level
fields.description: Specify the maximum heading level to include in the page's table of contents, overriding the site's Display.TableOfContents.MaximumLevel setting. This value only affects the table of contents when UseBuiltIn is set to false.
fields.name: MaximumLevel

fields.title: Use Built-In
fields.description: Choose whether to use Hugo's builtin table of contents or generate them with Platen, overriding the site's configuration for this page. This overrides the site's Display.TableOfContents.UseBuiltIn setting.
fields.name: UseBuiltIn

fields.title: As Ordered List
fields.description: Specify whether the table of contents should render its entries in an ordered list with numerals before each item. By default, the table of contents is rendered in an unordered list without any list markers, only with indents. This value overrides the site's Display.TableOfContents.OrderedList setting.
fields.name: OrderedList
